feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:14PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Thunderstorms Possible Through Late This Evening... Strong thunderstorms with frequent lightning, hail, gusty downdraft winds, and heavy downpours will be possible through late this evening. Storms have already initiated over the Fortymile Uplands and are moving west-northwest across Chena Hot Springs area. Some storms may move into the more populated areas
entry.cap:areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
